pullrequest.title: Upgrade to fuel-tools1 and automatically update paths -> pull request #2800

content.raw:
I think with the current implementation, the user needs to set the path even before opening Gazebo, predicting if they will insert a file from fuel, so I'd say the feature is currently unusable.

Ian's point about gzserver is valid, I'll investigate a bit, because as I understand it, we've  never had resource problems with models created in the model  editor, I think collision meshes are properly found and textures re visible to cameras.
content.html:
I think with the current implementation, the user needs to set the path even before opening Gazebo, predicting if they will insert a file from fuel, so I'd say the feature is currently unusable.

Ian's point about gzserver is valid, I'll investigate a bit, because as I understand it, we've never had resource problems with models created in the model editor, I think collision meshes are properly found and textures re visible to cameras.
